original_text:
After that comes the sound of his roar;
    he thunders with his majestic voice.
When his voice resounds,
    he holds nothing back.
korean_text: 그 후에 음성을 발하시며 그의 위엄 찬 소리로 천둥을 치시며 그 음성이 들릴 때에 번개를 멈추게 아니하시느니라

sentences.original_text: After that comes the sound of his roar
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그의 포효 소리가 온다

sentences.original_text: he thunders with his majestic voice
